text: The Wolseley Expedition was a military force that was led by Colonel Garnet Wolsely. Put together to capture the Canadian MÃ©tis leader Louis Riel, the expedition took place in 1870 and went from Toronto to Winnipeg. Since it had to carry so much equipment, including guns, the expedition is thought to be one of the most difficult in all of recent history. Category:1870 in North America Category:19th century in Canada
title: Wolseley Expedition
